local_intent: Perceive white_plate, approach with 0.01 tolerance, grasp and verify stability, transport to red_plate, align, release, and retreat.
assumptions: White and red plates are within reach.
coherence_with_global: Follows GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: perception -> approach/align (active leaf) -> grasp verification -> transport -> placement -> retreat. All parameter values use allowed binned choices.
